OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" SimulationMode="OnDemand" Text="Grid tools have a cool function that lets you quickly add lots of fields. Click the icon in the top right of the tool. 
You can split the content of the Variable List field (we paste into this field from documentation / Excel, SQL etc.) and provide each new variable with a prefix (recordset(). is handy) or suffix. 
Also, you can append to fields you have already typed into the tool or replace what is already there. 
Lastly, the tool will repeat the settings of the line that has the focus when you clicked the icon, so make sure you set that correctly first!"
